thread.section_title: TerraTrike Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TerraTrike | www.terratrike.com
thread.title: Patricia Sobel

author: Patricia Sobel
title: Patricia Sobel
text:
I ordered 2 accessories for my older TerraTrike Cruiser (which TerraTrike no longer makes) - the foam cushion for the back and seat, and the front wedge foam to give the "bucket" feel.
I contacted TerraTrike prior to ordering to ensure that these accessories would work with my Cruiser. They got back to me right away and said these would fit. I then ordered them and they came very quickly. They were easy to add to the Cruiser - perfect fit! Now my fun rides are even more comfortable.
In addition to great products, they clearly care a great deal about customer service. When I'm ready to replace my Cruiser, you can bet I'll be upgrading to a new TerraTrike. Thanks guys!
